title: How to Make a Gum Wrapper Herbal Cigarette

steps.title: Place the herbs into the small plastic bag.
steps.content: Place the herbs into the small plastic bag. Close the bag (empty out the air first) and begin crushing and mixing the leaves until only very small particles are left. If you used bay leaves you might have to break them down first or by themselves as they are pretty strong.

steps.title: Peel off the foil side of the 5 gum wrapper using your fingernail, coin, or another method.
steps.content: Peel off the foil side of the 5 gum wrapper using your fingernail, coin, or another method. If you need help doing this, look for a YouTube guide. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Place a small amount of the crushed mixture inside the wrapper and roll it.
steps.content: Place a small amount of the crushed mixture inside the wrapper and roll it. Close one end and allow a small opening on the other end, big enough to allow smoke through but not to let a lot of the mixture through. [2] X Research source
